endpoint_metadata.title: Avathon APM API
endpoint_metadata.description: Retrieves alarms visible to the authenticated user. Last 60 days of alarms data are returned if start and end dates are not passed.

query_parameters.name: startDate
query_parameters.description: Filter by start date. Supported formats are YYYY-MM-DD and YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.

query_parameters.name: endDate
query_parameters.description: Filter by end date. Supported formats are YYYY-MM-DD and YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.

query_parameters.name: elementId
query_parameters.description: Filter by elements (comma separated list of elementIds)

query_parameters.name: fault_type
query_parameters.description: Filter by fault type (comma separated list)

query_parameters.name: fault_order
query_parameters.description: Filter to show secondary faults (default is false)

query_parameters.name: page
query_parameters.description: The page of results to retrieve.
